name: Gestazion
description: Social, gamified and mobile. This is Gestazión, one of the top independent digital agencies in the country. They have offices in Madrid and Barcelona, and a team of 30 professionals with a wide range of experience and an unlimited passion for their work. Perhaps that is why relationships with our clients last more than five years on average. Specialization includes; inbound marketing, gamification marketing.

locations.address: Gran Vía de les Corts Catalanes
